page.title: 20HOME-LIFE - CHILDREN.
page.content: After school I usually watch television until my meal is ready. When tea is finished I do homework which I try to get over quickly. If the weather is good I go for a game of golf with friends to Whinhill Golf Course or to the football pitch for a game of softball. Softball is a bit like baseball only a different ball is used. If it is raining or cold I stay at home watching television. About 10.30p.m. I go to bed. Acknowledgements. Mrs.F.Farmer,Miss M.Dunn, Miss M.Lynch, Mr.B.McGovern, Miss S.Etherson, Mrs.J.Beattie, Mr.T.McLaughlin and pupils of Notre Dame High School. Mrs N.Dyer,Mr.P.Dunn and pupils of St. Lawrence's School. Mrs.M.McFadyen & pupils of St.Kenneth's School.
